content: समृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To meet, be united. {@--2@} To come into conflict. {@--3@} To bring together, construct. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (समर्पयति) {@--1@} To hand over, deliver, commit, consign. {@--2@} To give, present. {@--3@} To place in, put in or on, {@--4@} To strike, hit. {@--5@} To restore, return.
